title.rendered: MoneyGram Foundation joins hands with Smile Foundation to support the education of poor children

content.rendered:
MoneyGram Foundation joins hands with Smile Foundation to support the education of poor children

 

MoneyGram has joined hands with Smile Foundation to support the Mission Education programme which works towards providing education for underprivileged children. MoneyGram is supporting 200 underprivileged children who come from economically weaker families and socially disadvantaged communities. The broad objectives are to promote and catalyze universal education among underprivileged children particularly in backward locations in Hyderabad, to create the process to embrace these children into mainstream education in a sustained manner, to strengthen their abilities to cope up with the formal education system and to facilitate them to emerge as productive assets and set the foundation for nation building.

MoneyGram International Inc. is a money transfer company based in the United States with headquarters in Dallas, Texas. It has an operations center in St. Louis Park, Minnesota and regional and local offices around the world. MoneyGram businesses are divided into two categories: Global Funds Transfers and Financial Paper Products. The company provides its service to individuals and businesses through a network of agents and financial institutions.

MoneyGram is the second largest provider of money transfers in the world.The company operates in more than 200 countries with a global network of about 347,000 agent offices.
